statements: SELECT * FROM shipments
SELECT shipment_id, location, status FROM shipments
SELECT location, shipment_id, updated_at FROM shipments ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Delivered'
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE updated_at >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM shipments ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT shipment_id, location, status FROM shipments WHERE status = 'delivered';
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE location LIKE 'New%' AND status IN ('pending', 'in-transit') ORDER BY shipment_id ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, location, status, updated_at FROM shipments WHERE updated_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY location ASC, updated_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE status != 'cancelled' ORDER BY shipment_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM shipment_locations;
SELECT shipment_id, location FROM shipment_locations WHERE status = 'delivered';
SELECT location, shipment_id FROM shipment_locations WHERE status = 'in-transit' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipment_locations ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, location, status FROM shipment_locations WHERE status = 'delayed' ORDER BY shipment_id ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipment_locations WHERE status='delivered';
SELECT shipment_id, location FROM shipment_locations WHERE location='New York';
SELECT shipment_id, location, status FROM shipment_locations WHERE status='in-transit' ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, COUNT(*) AS update_count FROM shipment_status GROUP BY shipment_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT shipment_id, current_status, update_time FROM shipment_status ORDER BY update_time ASC, shipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipment_locations;
SELECT shipment_id, location FROM shipment_locations WHERE status='Delivered';
SELECT location, status FROM shipment_locations ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, location, status FROM shipment_locations WHERE location LIKE '%New%';
SELECT * FROM shipment_status WHERE update_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shipment_locations ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, location, status FROM shipment_locations WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT s.shipment_id, s.status, sh.event_description FROM shipment_locations s LEFT JOIN shipment_history sh ON s.shipment_id = sh.shipment_id;

SELECT s.shipment_id, ss.status, sh.event_time FROM shipment_locations s JOIN shipment_status ss ON s.shipment_id = ss.shipment_id JOIN shipment_history sh ON s.shipment_id = sh.shipment_id WHERE ss.status = 'Delivered';
SELECT s.shipment_id, sh.event_description, sh.event_time FROM shipment_locations s JOIN shipment_history sh ON s.shipment_id = sh.shipment_id WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM shipment_locations;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM shipment_locations WHERE shipment_id = 123;
SELECT shipment_id, location, timestamp FROM shipment_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipment_status WHERE status = 'In transit';
SELECT shipment_id, update_time FROM shipment_status WHERE shipment_id IN (456, 789);
SELECT shipment_id, location, timestamp FROM shipment_locations WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM shipment_status WHERE status IN ('In Transit', 'Delivered') ORDER BY update_time ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, location, timestamp FROM location_history WHERE location LIKE '%warehouse%' ORDER BY shipment_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_details WHERE user_id >= 100 ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM shipment_locations sl JOIN shipment_status ss ON sl.shipment_id = ss.shipment_id WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' AND status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY sl.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_status, current_location FROM shipments WHERE shipment_status='In Transit';
SELECT shipment_id, destination_location FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date = CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM shipment_history ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_location FROM delivery_agents ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = '729f71bb-6913-4be8-9313-336283b86c5b';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_status, current_location FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%';
SELECT s.shipment_id, s.shipment_status, a.agent_name FROM shipments s JOIN agent_shipment_assignment a ON s.shipment_id = a.shipment_id;
SELECT sh.event_type, sh.event_date, l.location_name FROM shipment_history sh JOIN locations l ON sh.location_id = l.location_id;
